results.title: Virus myocarditis in a 1-month-old boy presenting as two types of paroxysmal supraventricular tachycardia.
results.text_hl: The narrow @DISEASE_Tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@QRS tachycardia@@@ was diagnosed as incessant @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Ectopic_Junctional</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013613 @@@junctional ectopic tachycardia@@@.

citations.NLM: Fujita S, Futatani T, Kubo T, Itamochi M, Yachi Y, Iwasaki H, Shimao A, Ina S, Higashiyama H, Igarashi N, Hatasaki K. Virus myocarditis in a 1-month-old boy presenting as two types of paroxysmal supraventricular tachycardia. Pediatr Int. 2017 May;59(5):627-632. PMID: 28402006
